commit message:
Merge pull request #12 from matm/master

Fixed non-handling of HTML annotations (book info)
new TODO list, for internal changes
android.text.Html instead of own html parser
String => CharSequnce; better book annotation displaying
apply NeworkLibrary.rewriteUrl() method to links in book descriptions
'disable button lights' option has been moved from 'Screen' to 'Appearance' section
selection foreground option has been added
Traditioanl Chinese resources have been added
compareTo works correct for end-of-range values
refactoring: color parameter in drawWord method
ZLTextSelection object has been introduced (taken from 'selection' branch)
unused action codes have been removed
common base class for all android actions
restored 'select single word' long tapping option
selection cursor size depends on screen DPI
actions are added to the application
selection fixes; sccroll line if a part of selected element is visible
code cleanup: class Point has been moved to ZLTextSelection
